org.openimaj.audio.conversion

Class MultichannelToMonoProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.audio.Audio
      • org.openimaj.audio.AudioStream
        • org.openimaj.audio.processor.AudioProcessor
          • org.openimaj.audio.conversion.MultichannelToMonoProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<SampleChunk>

    public class MultichannelToMonoProcessor
extends AudioProcessor
    Converts a stereo audio stream into a mono one by averaging the channels' samples and creating a mono sample set. The audio format of the stream is changed. The process() method creates new SampleChunks with a new format.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
